title: Electric force - Net force on test charge

content.question: Three small objects with charges <math alttext="negative uppercase Q" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mpadded><mo>-</mo><mi>Q</mi></mpadded></math>, <math alttext="positive uppercase Q" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mpadded><mo>+</mo><mi>Q</mi></mpadded></math>, and <math alttext="positive uppercase Q" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mpadded><mo>+</mo><mi>Q</mi></mpadded></math>, respectively, are arranged vertically, as shown in the figure. A test charge <math alttext="lowercase positive q" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mpadded><mo>+</mo><mi>q</mi></mpadded></math> is placed a horizontal distance <math alttext="d" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>d</mi></math> from the middle charge. Which of the following best represents the direction of the net force exerted on the test charge by the three objects?

choices.label: The figure shows an arrow pointing horizontally to the left.
The figure shows an arrow pointing horizontally to the right.
The figure shows an arrow pointing diagonally upward and to the right.
The figure shows an arrow pointing diagonally upward and to the left.

content.answer: The figure shows an arrow pointing diagonally upward and to the right.
